data.effect:
**Divine Relic**

**Banish CARDNAME:** Your champion becomes an Ascendant in addition to its other types. Draw a card.
data.effect_raw:
Divine Relic

Banish Apotheosis Rite: Your champion becomes an Ascendant in addition to its other types. Draw a card.
data.name: Apotheosis Rite
data.effect_html: Divine RelicBanish Apotheosis Rite: Your champion becomes an Ascendant in addition to its other types. Draw a card.

data.effect:
**Divine Relic**

**On Enter:** Banish a non-champion card from your material deck face down.

**Banish Sacramental Rite:** Your champion becomes an Ascendant in addition to its other types. You may play the banished card.
data.effect_raw:
Divine Relic

On Enter: Banish a non-champion card from your material deck face down.

Banish Sacramental Rite: Your champion becomes an Ascendant in addition to its other types. You may play the banished card.
data.name: Sacramental Rite
data.effect_html: Divine RelicOn Enter: Banish a non-champion card from your material deck face down.Banish Sacramental Rite: Your champion becomes an Ascendant in addition to its other types. You may play the banished card.

editions.flavor: The leyline within Flagma flares to life once more, bathing intrepid souls in a fiery vortex of might.
The leyline within Flagma flares to life once more, bathing intrepid souls in a fiery vortex of might.
Within the thorned labyrinth, a hearth’s embers give rise to roses that bloom with forgotten visages.
Within the thorned labyrinth, a hearth’s embers give rise to roses that bloom with forgotten visages.
The vermillion bird blazes a fiery trail across the horizon, alight with a passion for knowledge.
The vermillion bird blazes a fiery trail across the horizon, alight a passion for knowledge.

data.flavor: Smoldering flames burn bright from within the soul, sparking a hunger for insight and destruction.
data.name: Spirit of Fire

data.effect:
This champion can't level up.

(6)**:** Draw a card and put a **level** counter on CARDNAME. Activate this ability only once. *(Champions get +1 level for each **level** counter on them.)*
data.effect_raw:
This champion can't level up.

(6): Draw a card and put a level counter on Nameless Champion. Activate this ability only once. (Champions get +1 level for each level counter on them.)
data.name: Nameless Champion
data.effect_html: This champion can't level up.6: Draw a card and put a level counter on Nameless Champion. Activate this ability only once. (Champions get +1 level for each level counter on them.)

editions.effect:
**%Immortal%Immortality%**, **Spellshroud**

[Guo Jia Bonus] At the beginning of your end phase, you may banish a card at random from your memory. If you do, draw a card.

[Guo Jia Bonus] Whenever you banish a card from your memory, put a **quest** counter on your champion. 

[REST]: You may remove ten **quest** counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform CARDNAME.
editions.effect_raw:
Immortality, Spellshroud

[Guo Jia Bonus] At the beginning of your end phase, you may banish a card at random from your memory. If you do, draw a card.

[Guo Jia Bonus] Whenever you banish a card from your memory, put a quest counter on your champion. 

REST: You may remove ten quest counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Azurite Fatestone.

other_orientations.effect:
**Spellshroud**, **Taunt**

[Guo Jia Bonus] **On Attack:** Choose one— 
 • Generate an Arcane Blast card and banish it. As long as it's banished, you may activate it, ignoring its elemental requirements.
 • **Empower X**+2, where **X** is the amount of arcane element cards in your banishment.
other_orientations.effect_raw:
Spellshroud, Taunt

[Guo Jia Bonus] On Attack: Choose one— 
 • Generate an Arcane Blast card and banish it. As long as it's banished, you may activate it, ignoring its elemental requirements.
 • Empower X+2, where X is the amount of arcane element cards in your banishment.
other_orientations.name: Seiryuu, Azure Dragon
other_orientations.effect_html: Spellshroud, TauntGuo Jia Bonus On Attack: Choose one— • Generate an Arcane Blast card and banish it. As long as it's banished, you may activate it, ignoring its elemental requirements. • Empower X+2, where X is the amount of arcane element cards in your banishment.

If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Azurite Fatestone.

If you do, draw a card.Guo Jia Bonus Whenever you banish a card from your memory, put a quest counter on your champion. : You may remove ten quest counters from your champion. If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Azurite Fatestone.

rule.description: The quest counter ability only triggers if the controller is the one banishing a card from their memory. It doesn't trigger if a different player banishes a card from it. For example, the quest counter ability will not trigger from an opponent resolving a Chilling Touch against a player that controls Fabled Azurite Fatestone.
If a transformed double-faced object would enter the graveyard from the field, it goes to the default location that the front would go. In this case, a regalia goes to its owner's banishment.

If you do, wake up and transform Fabled Azurite Fatestone.

**On Enter:**Draw seven cards.

On Enter:Draw seven cards.

Inherited Effect: Ignore the elemental requirements of basic element Slime cards you activate.
data.flavor: An aura of amiability radiates from the soul, but for some reason, it feels a bit sticky.
data.name: Spirit of Slime
data.effect_html: On Enter:Draw seven cards.Inherited Effect: Ignore the elemental requirements of basic element Slime cards you activate.

editions.flavor: Suzaku, mythical Shenju of flames. Purge this land clear of torment and hate so that we may live again.

data.effect: **On Enter**: **Glimpse 7**. Draw seven cards into your memory.
data.effect_raw: On Enter: Glimpse 7. Draw seven cards into your memory.
data.name: Spirit of Fortuitous Fire

result_editions.flavor: Suzaku, mythical Shenju of flames. Purge this land clear of torment and hate so that we may live again.

data.effect_html: On Enter: Glimpse 7. Draw seven cards into your memory.

data.effect:
**On Enter:** **Glimpse 6**. Draw six cards.

**Lineage Release** — **Recover 6**. *(Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)*
data.effect_raw:
On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards.

Lineage Release — Recover 6. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)
data.flavor: Searing insight found within all-consuming flame.
data.name: Spirit of Serene Fire

rule.description: Card in a champion's inner lineage means it must be in that lineage, but not the top card of it.

data.effect_html: On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards.Lineage Release — Recover 6. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)

editions.flavor: As the clash in Azoth intensified, many wondered: could an Oasis truly exist in a world where the line between rebellion and liberation was blurred?

data.effect: **On Enter:** **Glimpse 6**. Draw six cards. Then **summon** a Spirit Shard token.
data.effect_raw: On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Then summon a Spirit Shard token.
data.flavor: Fissures skate across Flagma's mantle. Gouts of flame torch the Oasis. Uncontrollable magma spills forth as the fragmented leyline burns itself to a cinder.
data.name: Fragmented Spirit of Fire

result_editions.flavor: As the clash in Azoth intensified, many wondered: could an Oasis truly exist in a world where the line between rebellion and liberation was blurred?

data.effect_html: On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Then summon a Spirit Shard token.

data.effect:
**Lorraine Lineage**

(2024): **Generate** any amount of Sword regalia cards and put them onto the field. For the rest of the game, Sword weapons you control can attack as though they were allies. Activate this ability only if Lorraine is an Ascendant.
data.effect_raw:
Lorraine Lineage

(2024): Generate any amount of Sword regalia cards and put them onto the field. For the rest of the game, Sword weapons you control can attack as though they were allies. Activate this ability only if Lorraine is an Ascendant.
data.name: Lorraine, Ascendant Wings
data.effect_html: Lorraine Lineage2024: Generate any amount of Sword regalia cards and put them onto the field. For the rest of the game, Sword weapons you control can attack as though they were allies. Activate this ability only if Lorraine is an Ascendant.

Whenever your champion levels up, deal 4 damage to target champion you don't control.

editions.flavor: The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.
The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.
The rivers of Wool Brook flow with depths concealed beneath reflections too perfect to trust.
The rivers of Wool Brook flow with depths concealed beneath reflections too perfect to trust.
The tides and waves thrash again as serpent and tortoise entwined awaken from their slumber.

**On Enter:** **Glimpse 6**. Draw six cards.

On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards.

data.flavor: Overflowing visions immersed within the waves.
data.name: Spirit of Serene Water

rule.description: Card in a champion's inner lineage means it must be in that lineage, but not the top card of it.

data.effect_html: On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Lineage Release — Recover 6. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)

editions.flavor: History encased in ice, thawing to unveil the past many sought to erase. A chilling reminder that alchemical revelations often come at a price.

data.effect: **On Enter:** **Glimpse 6**. Draw six cards. Then **summon** a Spirit Shard token.
data.effect_raw: On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Then summon a Spirit Shard token.
data.flavor: Relentless hail stabs the frozen air. Hoarfrost chokes Krustal of life. Crystalline daggers of ice form from the deluge of rain as the fragmented leyline shatters.
data.name: Fragmented Spirit of Water
